name: Fractal Collector
description:
Fractal Collector

This is a experimental game with real time fractals.

Watch the making of: Goal Normal gameplay

Collect all the starbits to unlock the portal to the next level. 

There is a Level randomiser included to have endless fun.

Fractal Creator

There is a creator level, so you can create your own fractal and explore it.

Controls

"Space" to move forwards

W,a,s,d or arrow keys to rotate.

Framerate improvements

If you are having frame rate issues, go to the pause menu and lover the rendering distance or turn of the shadows.

View the project on Github:

https://github.com/Jellevermandere/Fractal-Explorer
